plot: Bhooloham is a 2014 Tamil film directed by N. Kalyanakrishnan. The film stars Jayam Ravi, Trisha Krishnan, Prakash Raj and Narayan in lead roles.
title: Boologam
plot_es: Bhooloham is a 2014 Tamil film directed by N. Kalyanakrishnan. The film stars Jayam Ravi, Trisha Krishnan, Prakash Raj and Narayan in lead roles.
plot_en: Bhooloham is a 2014 Tamil film directed by N. Kalyanakrishnan. The film stars Jayam Ravi, Trisha Krishnan, Prakash Raj and Narayan in lead roles.
